entry.title: Monday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 17 April 2023
